DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this observational study is to measure the real-life persistence, adherence and clinical effectiveness of entecavir in patients with chronic Hepatitis B viral infection.
DOC.brief_title: Persistence, Adherence and Clinical Effectiveness of Entecavir in Chronic Hepatitis B Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Sampling Method: Probability Sample (consecutive patient sampling)
DOC.criteria: Male and female treatment na√Øve or pretreated CHB patients of at least 18 years of age Written informed consent All relevant conditions according to Summary of product characteristics (SmPC) Human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), Hepatitis C virus (HCV) or Hepatitis D virus (HDV) coinfection Patients currently included in any investigational trial on CHB
